reviews.review: top mas todo quebrado

As a new killer player you are forcibly put against people who have played for a long time that outclass you through owning numerous perks and who understand how exploit the mechanics of the game because nobody at high ranks actually wants to play as the killer.

If you can get it on sale and play for a few matches against people of your own level it'll be good fun but the longer you play the worse it gets.

A really neat game, apart from the toxic community.
I think this is the typical online game case, where the game itself gets a positive review, because it's just the players who ruin the vibe for me. 
But if you bring your friends to play survivor and just chill and have fun instead of taking it too seriously, it's an overall fun experience.

I get spooked easily, so it took a lot of persuasion to get me to play this game. Overall, I enjoy it. Playing with friends definitely makes the matches more fun. Lowering the game volume, but still where I can hear the terror radius cues, has helped me handle the BIG SPOOK.

The game is fun, but the community is toxic.

I have changed my review to thumbs up.  Since I quit because of toxicity at the end of rounds, I took a year or so off and came back to much less ugliness.  In fact, it's always refreshing to get some positive comments at the end of rounds.

It has improved enough to regain my favor for a couple months now.  Pinhead is a particular favorite.

This game is very succulent, and I recommend this game 10/10

Steep learning curve, and some players have some toxic tendencies (Hook camping killers, flashlight/teabag spamming survivors).

For the most part though, when you get a good killer and a decent team of survivors it's some of the best fun you can have.

Dead by Daylight ist und bleibt eine Hass-Liebe - sorgt für Unterhaltung bis man auf Camper/Tunnler trifft. Jedoch bietet es reichlich Abwechslung, da keine Runde der anderen gleicht. Andere Killer, andere Mitspieler - und genau vor diesen sollte man sich oftmals mehr in Acht nehmen als vor dem Killer selbst. :D DBD bekommt regelmäßig neue DLCs, Codes für Skins oder Ingame-Währung usw. Schreckmomente gibt es zwar, jedoch ist "Horror" nicht ganz das treffende Wort. Spaß macht es aber allemal. :)
